SQL.LOAD: SELECT code, description, producer_type_xcd, company_id, address_id, tax_id_number, regulator_registration_id, created_by, created_date, modified_by, modified_date, producer_id FROM elp_producer WHERE producer_id = :producer_id
SQL.LOAD_LIST: SELECT producer_id, code, description, producer_type_xcd, elita.GetDescriptionFromItemextcode(producer_type_xcd) producer_type, company_id, address_id, tax_id_number, regulator_registration_id, created_by, created_date, modified_by, modified_date FROM elp_producer WHERE --dynamic_in_clause --dynamic_where_clause --dynamic_order_by_clause
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_producer SET code = upper(:code), description = :description, producer_type_xcd = :producer_type_xcd, company_id = :company_id, address_id = :address_id, tax_id_number = :tax_id_number, regulator_registration_id = :regulator_registration_id, modified_by = :modified_by WHERE producer_id = :producer_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_producer ( code, description, producer_type_xcd, company_id, address_id, tax_id_number, regulator_registration_id, created_by, producer_id ) VALUES ( upper(:code), :description, :producer_type_xcd, :company_id, :address_id, :tax_id_number, :regulator_registration_id, :created_by, :producer_id )
